channel.title: How do i make

item.title: How do i make
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

[code] if(autoancient == 6)//ice barrage { inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(369, 30, 3); actionTimer = 5; setAnimation(1979); }
First off, this is only the barrage code for while autocasting on the ancient staff, but this is what you would do... [code] if(autoancient == 6)//ice barrage { inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(369, 30, 3); actionTimer = 5; setAnimation(1979); } [/code] Change to: [code] if(autoancient == 6)//ice barrage if(playerRights >= 2) { //admin only { inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(369, 30, 3); actionTimer = 5; setAnimation(1979); } } [/code][/code]

Read full topic
